column4: Hey, everyone. I'm looking for some OCR software to use on 10.04 for some testing purposes.. ocrfeeder seems to be one but when I try to install it the package can't be found :(
I've not tried any of them so I can't help with them, I just guessed at the trigger for the bot
Haha I appreciate it.. i did see those but I read that ocrfeeder was the most suggested one.. but couldn't get it to install. i'll check out these other ones then.
